trans-unit.source: The exception that occurs when an error condition prevents accessing or creating a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 在错误条件阻止访问或创建 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemObject" /> 时发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: 类中<xref:System.Printing>命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides a specific error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定错误消息的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that is interpreted as an HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 指 HRESULT，编码数值指分配给特定异常的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides a specific error code and error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定错误代码和错误消息的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或反序列化对象时所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化流的上下文，包括源和目标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides specific serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定序列化信息和流上下文的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The underlying error condition that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致异常的基础错误条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides a specific error message, including the underlying cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定错误消息（包括发生异常的基础原因）的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that is interpreted as an HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 指 HRESULT，编码数值指分配给特定异常的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The underlying error condition that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致异常的基础错误条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides a specific error code and error message, including the underlying cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定错误代码和错误消息（包括发生异常的基础原因）的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that is interpreted as an HRESULT, a coded numerical value that is assigned to a specific exception.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 指 HRESULT，编码数值指分配给特定异常的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误条件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The exception message sent by the printer driver or unmanaged print system component that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 打印机驱动程序或触发了异常的非托管打印系统组件所发送的异常消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> class that provides a specific error code, error message, and printer message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化提供特定错误代码、错误消息和打印机消息的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintSystemException" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或反序列化对象时所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The context, including source and destination, of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化流的上下文，包括源和目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data that is used to serialize the object and gets the context of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于序列化对象的数据和获取序列化流的上下文。
